Package critters.dataclasses

Class Critter

  • java.lang.Object
    • critters.dataclasses.Critter

  • public abstract class Critter
extends java.lang.Object
    The Abstract Critter class which has the basic functionality and porperties of a Critter
    Author:
    Neel Drain

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int canvasSize
      The size of the UI canvas
      protected javafx.scene.paint.Color color
      The color of the specific Critter instance, default set to Color.RED
      protected critters.dataclasses.GridCoordinate coordinates
      The coordinates for the specific Critter instance
      protected int energy
      Set to 100, can be changed
      protected int fight_power
      Set to 0, can be changed
      int gridBounds
      The bounds of the grid
      protected int min_reproduce_energy
      Set to 20
      protected int reproduce_number
      Set to 0, can be changed
      protected int rest_energy_cost
      Set to 1
      protected int run_energy_cost
      Set to 5
      protected int run_length
      Set to 2
      protected int walk_energy_cost
      Set to 2
      protected int walk_length
      Set to 1

      • reproduce

        public java.lang.Boolean reproduce​()
        The reproduce method, checks to see if the Critter has enough energy to reproduce, if so deducts min_reproduce_energy from the Critter's energy
        Returns:
        true if the energy is enough, false otherwise
